settings.title: Rewriting the Rules<br class="hide-desktop"> of Beauty
settings.text: We live at the intersection of products and practices that are sustainable<br class="hide-mobile">and safe without sacrificing performance or quality.

settings.title: Rewriting the Rules of Beauty
settings.description: We live at the intersection of products and practices that are sustainable and safe without sacrificing performance or quality.

settings.title:
Curl Care
That's Good 4U
and the Planet
settings.description:
Our natural hair care line is science-backed,
nature-made, and totally clean for your
curls, health, and the environment.

settings.title:
Curl Technology
 4 years in the making
settings.text:
We knew we couldn’t change the face of curl
care without using science – clean science that
is. Every product within the line is formulated
with our patented, award-winning molecule
Hemi15 (aka Hemisqualane) - created from 100%
ethically grown, renewable sugarcane. Before we
came around, silicone was the leading ingredient
in haircare. But, 50 research studies and over 50
global patents later, Hemi15 has been proven as a
superior silicone alternative that deeply repairs,
protects, and smooths all curl types and textures
– there is nothing else like it on the market.

settings.title:
Curl Care That’s Good
4U and the Planet
settings.text:
Our natural hair care line is science-backed,
nature-made, and totally clean for your curls, health, and the environment.

settings.title: Totally Clean <br class="hide-desktop">Curl Care
settings.text: When we started 4U, we set out on a mission to make clean curl care accessible and effective. We believe clean beauty is the future of beauty and our commitment is to bring you safe, affordable, truly clean products that make your natural hair journey simpler.

settings.title: Simple
settings.subtitle: Easy-to-use curl care systems made from naturally derived ingredients you can pronounce.

settings.title: Safe
settings.subtitle: Totally clean, EWG verified products free from harmful chemicals and 100% safe for you and your kids.

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.subtitle: Biodegradable formulas made from sustainably sourced and manufactured ingredients.

settings.title: Science-Backed
settings.subtitle: Clinically-proven and developed in partnership with the world’s leading clean scientists.

settings.title: Next Generation Clean <br class="hide-mobile">Curl Care
settings.text: Our mission is to develop products that are good for you and good for the planet. We teamed up with the world’s leading clean scientist and formulators to push our products to do the most with the fewest possible ingredients. Our formulations will never include silicone, sulfates, or parabens because, at 4U, clean beauty is always safe, ethical, and environmentally friendly. Period.

settings.title: Next Generation<br class="hide-desktop"> Clean Curl Care
settings.text: Our mission is to develop products that are good for you and good for the planet. We teamed up with the world’s leading clean scientist and formulators to push our products to do the most with the fewest possible ingredients. Our formulations will never include silicone, sulfates, or parabens because, at 4U, clean beauty is always safe, ethical, and environmentally friendly. Period.

settings.title: Curl Technology<br class="hide-mobile"> 4 years in the making
settings.text: We knew we couldn’t change the face of curl care without using science – clean science that is. Every product within the line is formulated with our patented, award-winning molecule Hemi15 (aka Hemisqualane) - created from 100% ethically grown, renewable sugarcane. Before we came around, silicone was the leading ingredient in haircare. But, 50 research studies and over 50 global patents later, Hemi15 has been proven as a superior silicone alternative that deeply repairs, protects, and smooths all curl types and textures – there is nothing else like it on the market.

settings.title: Curl Technology<br class="hide-desktop"> 4 years in the making
settings.text: We knew we couldn’t change the face of curl care without using science – clean science that is. Every product within the line is formulated with our patented, award-winning molecule Hemi15 (aka Hemisqualane) - created from 100% ethically grown, renewable sugarcane. Before we came around, silicone was the leading ingredient in haircare. But, 50 research studies and over 50 global patents later, Hemi15 has been proven as a superior silicone alternative that deeply repairs, protects, and smooths all curl types and textures – there is nothing else like it on the market.

settings.title: Our Results Are Proven
settings.text: During a recent consumer study:

settings.title: Protecting The Planet<br class="hide-desktop"> and Your Curls
settings.text:
Truly clean products and harness the best of nature without harming it. <br class="hide-mobile">
Every one of the products in our collection includes naturally derived<br class="hide-mobile">
 ingredients with proven benefits for curly hair. Our products are produced <br class="hide-mobile">with pioneering processes like sugarcane fermentation, where we convert<br class="hide-mobile"> basic plant sugars into rare bioidentical molecules that are included in <br class="hide-mobile">everyday products that don’t deplete the source. The result? High-<br class="hide-mobile">performance, biodegradable formulas crafted with sustainability in mind.

settings.subtitle: Deeply nourishes and<br class="hide-mobile"> moisturizes hair from root to tip after just one use.

Tia’s Favorites
